executed_inmates.name: Justen Hall
executed_inmates.last_statement: Yeah, I want to address the Roundtree family and apologize for the pain and suffering I caused. And to the Diaz’s family that I had to put you through this, it should have never happened. And to my mom and Morelia I love you and I’m going to miss you all. I’m ready

executed_inmates.name: Robert Mitchell Jennings
executed_inmates.last_statement: To my friends and family it was a nice journey. To the family of the police officer I hope this finds you peace and be well and stay safe. Enjoy life’s moments because we never get them back.

executed_inmates.name: Larry Swearingen
executed_inmates.last_statement: Lord forgive them. They don’t know what they are doing

executed_inmates.name: George Jones
executed_inmates.last_statement: Yes, I do, uh at this time I would like to thank my parents who have been my pillar of strength throughout this. To my brothers and sisters and all my family members who have supported me and who have loved me despite my faults and imperfections. I would like to thank Pastor Williams for counseling me and guiding me. As I look to my right and I see the family of Forest Hall. I hope this brings you closure or some type of peace. I hope it helps his family, son and loved ones. This has been a long journey, one of enlightenment. It's not the end, it's only the beginning.

executed_inmates.name: Danielle Simpson
executed_inmates.last_statement: Yeah, I want to tell my family I love ya'll. Tell Kate I love her too. Tell brother, my kids I live ya'll. I'm gonna miss ya'll. I'm ready, ready.
